entries.name: jira:approve
entries.intent: Request, view, and process approvals (pr, deploy, release, issue)

entries.name: jira-orchestrator:batch
entries.intent: Jira Batch Operations

entries.name: jira:branch
entries.intent: Create feature branch with Jira issue key naming and auto-transition

entries.name: jira:bulk-commit
entries.intent: Process multiple existing commits and send aggregated updates to Jira

entries.name: jira:cancel
entries.intent: Cancel ongoing Jira issue orchestration and save checkpoint for resume

entries.name: jira:commit-template
entries.intent: Generate conventional commit templates from Jira issue context with smart commits

entries.name: jira:commit
entries.intent: Create git commit with Jira smart commit syntax for automatic issue updates

entries.name: jira:compliance
entries.intent: Generate compliance reports, track controls, export audit evidence, and manage exceptions for SOC2, GDPR, and ISO27001

entries.name: jira:confluence
entries.intent: Read, write, sync, create, or link Confluence pages to Jira issues

entries.name: jira:council
entries.intent: Agent council review using blackboard pattern for comprehensive PR analysis

entries.name: jira:create-repo
entries.intent: Create a new modular Harness repository with full infrastructure scaffolding (Helm, Terraform, K8s), concise README with Confluence links, and Jira integration. Interactive by default.

entries.name: jira:deploy
entries.intent: Track deployment, update Jira with status, timestamps, metadata

entries.name: jira:docs-external
entries.intent: Publish documentation to external platforms (GitHub Wiki, API docs, GitBook, Notion, README updates, blog posts)

entries.name: jira:docs
entries.intent: Generate documentation for completed Jira issue work with Confluence sync

entries.name: jira:enterprise
entries.intent: Enterprise features - notifications, approvals, portfolio, compliance, exports

entries.name: jira:events
entries.intent: Query event sourcing system for audit trails, time-travel debugging, and state reconstruction

entries.name: jira:export
entries.intent: Export Jira issues and generate reports in multiple formats with templates and scheduling

entries.name: jira-orchestrator:harness-review
entries.intent: Harness PR Review Command

entries.name: jira:infra
entries.intent: Infrastructure management - create repos, deploy, manage pipelines

entries.name: jira-orchestrator:install-hooks
entries.intent: /jira:install-hooks

entries.name: jira:intelligence
entries.intent: Access AI-powered predictive analytics, smart prioritization, and learning insights

entries.name: jira:iterate
entries.intent: [DEPRECATED] Use /jira:pr --iterate instead

entries.name: jira:metrics
entries.intent: Generate real-time metrics dashboard with SLA tracking, agent performance, and throughput analysis

entries.name: jira:notify
entries.intent: Manage notifications, webhooks, channels, and subscriptions

entries.name: jira:orchestrate-advanced
entries.intent: Execute advanced orchestration patterns including Blackboard, Circuit Breaker, Dynamic Replanning, and Saga patterns

entries.name: jira:plan-prs
entries.intent: Analyze issue and create PR delivery strategy before coding

entries.name: jira-orchestrator:portfolio
entries.intent: Portfolio Management

entries.name: pr-fix
entries.intent: [DEPRECATED] Use /jira:pr --fix instead

entries.name: jira:pr
entries.intent: Create, fix, or iterate on pull requests for Jira issues

entries.name: jira:prepare
entries.intent: Analyze task, decompose into subtasks, enrich with details, create TDD draft

entries.name: jira:process-worklogs
entries.intent: Process pending worklogs and post them to Jira

entries.name: jira:qa-review
entries.intent: Review QA tickets - improve content, create docs, respond to comments

entries.name: jira:quality
entries.intent: Generate quality intelligence report with tech debt analysis, health scoring, and predictive insights

entries.name: jira-orchestrator:reason
entries.intent: Reasoning Command

entries.name: jira:release
entries.intent: Multi-project release planning, coordination, and execution with automated release notes, go/no-go decisions, and rollback management

entries.name: jira:review
entries.intent: Comprehensive code review with security, performance, quality, and accessibility analysis

entries.name: jira:setup
entries.intent: Interactive setup wizard v7.5.0 - OAuth auth, Neon PostgreSQL, Redis, Temporal workflows

entries.name: jira:ship
entries.intent: One command to ship - intelligent question gathering, prepare, code, PR, and council review

entries.name: jira:sla
entries.intent: Monitor SLA status, configure SLA rules, generate SLA reports, and analyze SLA breaches

entries.name: jira:sprint-plan
entries.intent: Automated sprint planning with capacity calculation, backlog prioritization, and velocity-based commitment

entries.name: jira:sprint
entries.intent: Sprint planning, metrics, and quality - consolidated command for all sprint operations

entries.name: jira:status
entries.intent: Monitor active Jira orchestration sessions and track sub-agent progress across all phases

entries.name: jira:sync
entries.intent: Bi-directional sync - pull Jira details, push local progress, detect & resolve conflicts

entries.name: jira:team
entries.intent: Team and resource management - capacity, skills, workload, burnout, and forecasting

entries.name: jira:triage
entries.intent: Analyze issue to determine optimal workflow path

entries.name: jira:work
entries.intent: Orchestrate Jira issue work - parallelize sub-issues, assign experts, execute 6-phase protocol, document via Harness
